def initialize(attributes={}, filter=nil)
  self.merge!(attributes)
  yield self if block_given?
end

merge!(other) click to toggle source 
# File lib/citeproc/item.rb, line 31
def merge!(other)
  other = other.attributes unless other.is_a?(Hash)
  other.each_pair { |key, value| self.attributes[key] = Variable.parse(value, key) }
  self
end
reverse_merge!(other) click to toggle source 
# File lib/citeproc/item.rb, line 37
def reverse_merge!(other)
  other = other.attributes unless other.is_a?(Hash)
  other.each_pair { |key, value| self.attributes[key] ||= Variable.parse(value, key) }
  self
end
to_s() click to toggle source 
# File lib/citeproc/item.rb, line 43
def to_s
  self.attributes.inspect
end
